column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Last week I went to Ireland to visit my family .
#text=I rode the bus to the airport .
#text=At the airport I checked in my luggage and went through security .
#text=After going through security I headed towards the departure gate .
#text=I waited at the gate for about 30minutes and then people started to board .
#text=The airline woman checked my ticket and passport and I got on the plane .
#text=Before the plane took off the air hostesses gave a quick security briefing .
#text=On the plane I sat beside a nice old man .
#text=We talked about what we were going to do in Ireland .
#text=He said that he wanted to meet new friends and visit the popular tourist spots .
#text=After about an hour the air hostess brought me some refreshments .
#text=After 2 hours we landed at our destination .
#text=I exited the plane and collected my suitcase .
#text=I walked through the exit doors and saw my family waiting for me outside .
